summary: **The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim** is a popular action-adventure game released in 2011. It's the fifth game in the Elder Scrolls series and takes place in the province of Skyrim. You play as the Dragonborn, trying to stop Alduin the World-Eater, a dragon who wants to destroy everything. The game lets you explore a huge world, complete quests, and improve your character's skills. It received lots of praise and sold millions of copies. Several expansions and remasters have been released, making it one of the greatest games ever made.
title: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim
